pr_title: Update documentation for Azure Stack Hub sample

timeline.message: Update documentation for Azure Stack Hub sample

timeline.bodyText: nit: remove en-us from URL. It'll redirect to the correct locale.
timeline.author: conniey
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -12,10 +12,17 @@ import java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch; /** - * This sample shows how to setup an Event Processor that uses an older version of blob storage service as - * checkpoint store. + * This sample shows how to setup an Event Processor that uses a different version of blob storage service that is + * not directly supported by Storage Blob SDK as checkpoint store. + * + * The following sample can be used if the environment you are targeting supports a different version of Storage Blob + * SDK than those typically available on Azure. For example, if you are running Event Hubs on an Azure Stack Hub version + * 2002, the highest available version for the Storage service is version 2017-11-09. In this case, you will need to use + * the following code to change the Storage service API version to 2017-11-09. For more information on the Azure Storage + * service versions supported on Azure Stack Hub, please refer to + * Azure Stack Hub Documentation

In this case, you will need to use * the following code to change the Storage service API version to 2017-11-09. For more information on the Azure Storage * service versions supported on Azure Stack Hub, please refer to - * Azure Stack Hub Documentation + * Azure Stack Hub Documentation */ public class EventProcessorWithCustomStorageVersion {
